package.name: localize
package.description:
Code to compute the offset between the smooth frame and the local utm-based frame.
As the vehicle moves, its position in the smooth frame drifts with unbounded errors (dead-reckoning). The localizers in this packages compute that drift.
The fake localizer uses the GPS readings from the Applanix (about 1m RMS error).
package.author: Jesse Levinson
Brice Rebsamen
